sentences.en: Battle Scarred ( Level 15 ) - You are nearly impervious to damage.
sentences.cn: 战斗伤疤 ( 要求等级15级 ) 你基本上不受伤害的影响.

sentences.en: He remained impervious to all Nell's sulks and blandishments.
sentences.cn: 对尼尔的愠怒和甜言蜜语,他都无动于衷.

sentences.en: He was completely impervious to criticism.
Her grace was impervious to hints.
sentences.cn: 她对别人的劝说完全无动于衷.

sentences.en: Impervious surface moisture in building a permanent waterproof layer.
sentences.cn: 在建筑物表面形成抗渗防潮的永久防水层.

sentences.en: Impervious to the effect of a magnetic field; resistant to magnetization.
sentences.cn: 防磁的不受磁场作用干扰的; 防磁的.

sentences.en: In this view, employment is impervious to shifts in any particular demand.
sentences.cn: 按照这种观点, 就业不会因任何特定需求的变化而改变.

sentences.en: It could not pass through material impervious to water such as mica.
sentences.cn: 它不能通过云母这样的不透水的物质.

sentences.en: It was growing colder and colder, but Xiangzi seemed impervious.
sentences.cn: 天是越来越冷了, 祥子似乎没觉到.

sentences.en: She seems almost impervious to the criticism from all sides.
sentences.cn: 对于来自各方的指责，她似乎无动于衷。

sentences.en: She was impervious to his charms.
sentences.cn: 他的魅力不能令她动心.

sentences.en: The floorcovering you select will need to be impervious to water.
sentences.cn: 挑选的地板材料必须是防水的。

sentences.en: They loved each other and were impervious to family pressures.
sentences.cn: 他们相恋,不理会家庭方面的压力.

sentences.en: This material is impervious to gases and liquids.
sentences.cn: 气体和液体都透不过这种物质.

sentences.en: We are impervious in the enjoyment of it.
sentences.cn: 我们对它的享受是不受干扰的.

words.tran_cn: 不能渗透的；不接受的（等于impervious）
不渗透性；不透水性；不通透性
不受影响的，无动于衷的；不能渗透的

phrases.tran_cn: 不透水材料；不透气物料

trans.tran_cn: 不可渗透的，透不过的，无动于衷的，不受影响的
trans.tran_en: not affected or influenced by something and seeming not to notice it
